name: Bella Vista Bistro
tagline: Authentic Italian Cuisine in the Heart of the City

featuredItems.name: Margherita Pizza
featuredItems.description: Fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on thin crust

featuredItems.name: Osso Buco
featuredItems.description: Slow-braised veal shanks with risotto alla Milanese

featuredItems.name: Tiramisu
featuredItems.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers

items.name: Bruschetta

items.name: Grilled Salmon

reviews.author: John D.
reviews.text: Amazing food and atmosphere! The pasta was perfect.

reviews.author: Sarah L.
reviews.text: Great service and delicious wine selection.
